title: 14K WHITE GOLD KATE 2.2MM ROUND CUT, LAB DIAMOND RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description: A delicate 2.2MM stone size exclusively available in 14K gold and lab-grown diamonds. The Kate 2.2MM rivière bracelet features a refined single strand of lab-grown diamonds and a classic 4-prong silhouette.
